attributes.action: stop the government uploading your personal health details onto a national IT system which is not guaranteed to be secure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In april primary care trusts will begin uploading your personal health details onto a national system without your consent, you will have to opt out of the system.There are concerns about the ethics, security and confidentiality of sharing your sensitive information via an electronic system.
